website_summaries.verdict: A simple yet elegant Barbie, but somewhat limited as a gift outside of birthdays.
pros: A pretty outfit with sparkles adds visual appeal
Includes toy gift and outfit accessories
Makes for a quick, easy, and affordable gift
cons: A very basic Barbie with precious few extras

customer_reviews.title: Not your mama's Barbie
customer_reviews.text: The doll's top is actually molded onto the body so dress changes are difficult with this one, making some tops too tight. Two stars because the hair is super frizzy, frazzled and uneven! Really not sure who did your hair this time, Barbie, but you need a new stylist. Also, the hair is much more sparse than the classic Barbie that I remember having. These pics show the condition just after opening the package. I braided the hair to make it a little more presentable but I was really disappointed with the condition.
customer_reviews.author: Zsuzsi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful birthday Barbie
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful birthday Barbie, I used her for decorating 21st birthday cake
customer_reviews.author: Heather De La Paz

customer_reviews.title: hollow legs which are nit as nice as the solid
customer_reviews.text: This Barbie has plastic, hollow legs which are nit as nice as the solid, rubber-like barbie legs. The pink top is made onto her and doent really get in the way too much when putting clothes on this doll however it would be nice if removable. Her skirt and shoes are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Genuine- Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: This was My Grand-Daughter's favorite present that We got Her for Her 4th Birthday. Her Eyes lit up and She beamed a Great big smile. She's got a ton of Barbie's, but there are never enough for My Grand-Daughter. Very high-quality item and genuine Barbie doll. Worth the money, to See My 4 year Grand-Daughter so Very Happy. I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny B Goode

customer_reviews.title: Not a good collection starter!
customer_reviews.text: Barbie arrived and box has 3 cuts in it. Would not be so bad for a birthday present for playing but for a 1 year olds 1st Barbie to start her collection does not make a very good present!!!!
customer_reviews.author: gindaze

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this for a little girls birthday and she loved it. I always get a little concerned about ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a little girls birthday and she loved it. I always get a little concerned about ordering toys online because sometimes the packaging gets messed up, but this one was great and held up in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday idea!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old's birthday. She loves the pretty pink outfit and how she can attach the present to Barbie's finger. The box is perfect for gifting and includes a happy birthday gift tag.
customer_reviews.author: Nbtokb

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a birthday present to a 5 year old at church. Her Mom says she loves this doll. Places it on the pillow next to her each night upon going to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Ray

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, perfect for a Barbie lover's birthday
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a Barbie dollhouse for my daughter's birthday when I came across this doll. How perfect is she?! My daughter is obsessed with pink and some this was for her birthday, it couldn't get any better. The present Barbie is holding is blue- I saw some pictures of her holding a pink one. I don't know if any come with pink, but ours is blue.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Wolz

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed as a toy. Doll comes with necklace, tiara, shoes, skirt and gift. The top part of the dress is painted on. Feels cheap. The box is pretty though. I imagine this Barbie is good for Barbie cakes given the top part that would match a frosting skirt. Meh as a toy.
customer_reviews.author: californiacat

customer_reviews.title: Barbie is still a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with our granddaughter. It traveled to school with her the very next day. The same quality and value that you would expect to receive from a Barbie product and appropriate for a younger girl. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, doll, packaging not good
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful doll.. I had one as a child and wanted to give my daughter one.. The packay arrived ripped like someone tried to open it already. I'll tape it and give it to her.. her birthday is in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Arthur

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: My client loved this doll! The rosette bodice went perfectly with my cake design.
customer_reviews.author: Chyna Hunt

customer_reviews.title: The Barbies are beautifully dressed and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Seems my granddaughters are into Barbies now. Ordered one each for their birthdays. They love them, cart them around in strollers. Good buy, good value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Doll
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need for wife's birthday in January. Bought through the used page with some injuries to the box but that's no biggie for me. Not sure why UPS left the box at the garage door instead of the front door but I did find it.
customer_reviews.author: Teamjj

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Birthday Barbie Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This Barbie is beautiful. It was delivered the next day and in perfect condition. The price was great, as well. Any Barbie-loving child will love this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Chella

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it, super cute
customer_reviews.text: Used this Barbie for a Barbie cake and was perfect! My daughter loved it

customer_reviews.title: Can't give as a gift!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely unacceptable! Ordered as a birthday gift for a friend. Package OPENED and box damaged!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my ONLY grandchild’s 5 th birthday. It came in perfect condition. It came on time . I know she will LOVE it

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a little girl!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my little sister’s birthday present! She loved it so much. It was her favorite gift and she’s still talking about it days later.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a 4yr old princess

customer_reviews.title: Great gift

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box
customer_reviews.text: The box was all damaged, looks like a returned piece was sent to me. The doll itself wasnt damaged though. I bought it as a gift, so had to repack all of it.
customer_reviews.author: NVK

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it. She is quite pretty. Her top doesn't come off, but she can still fit in other barbie clothes. Good purchase. I would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Birthday Barbie for a little girls birthday coming up and when the package arrived it was totally beat up. The plastic front cover was coming off. The sides of the box are ripped. I had to try and glue/ tape the box up to even look semi presentable as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Barbie is soo pretty
customer_reviews.text: Thought about putting this in the Barbie cake....but once I got it, It was TOO pretty to get all dirty in frosting. So w gave this as a birthday gift and chose the traditional Barbie torso for the Barbie cake. Her bodice is molded on and that helps keep the clothes on... Skirt is very fancy. little girls will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy dune'r

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved it. It got there on her birthday

customer_reviews.text: Needed a body double to play a joke for my husband's bday. Her "top" is plastic so I couldn't use her.

customer_reviews.title: Smiles All Over!

customer_reviews.title: The Happy Birthday Barbie Doll looked nice online
customer_reviews.text: The Happy Birthday Barbie Doll looked nice online, but not what I expected. My little girl likes almost any doll she sees and she likes this one too. What I noticed most about Happy Birthday Barbie was her face. It does not look like the barbie doll faces that I'm used to seeing. Her face is very small and narrow, I wish they would plump up the face a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: mary urban

product_meta.title: Barbie Happy Birthday Doll [Amazon Exclusive]
product_meta.description: Dressed in a sparkling pink dress, Barbie doll is ready to celebrate the birthday honoree with a pretty wrapped gift! Her perfect party dress stands out with a glittery soft light-pink bodice and vibrant hot pink skirt. The waist is cinched with a pink bow sash, and the entire dress sparkles with glitter! Barbie doll wears matching accessories -pink shoes, a detailed statement necklace and headband -and comes with a wrapped gift to expand the storytelling fun. Make someone’s birthday special because with Barbie, you can be anything. Doll cannot stand alone. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: Barbie doll sparkles in a glittery party dress to celebrate a birthday.
The glam look stands out with a glittery soft light-pink bodice and vibrant hot pink skirt with sparkling details.
Matching accessories include a cute pair of shoes, a detailed statement necklace, a pink bow sash belt and headband.
A wrapped gift expands the storytelling fun.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,503 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
